abstract: AT&T says its television subscribers could lose the Hallmark Channel at the end of the month due to a fight over the carriage fees that are paid Crown Media Holdings.
snippet: AT&T says its television subscribers could lose the Hallmark Channel at the end of the month due to a fight over the carriage fees that are paid Crown Media Holdings.
lead_paragraph: For the second time this summer, AT&T is fighting a carriage fee dispute in public days before a contract deadline.

headline.main: AT&T and Crown Media Squabble Over Hallmark Channel
